author: sourceforge-skipoles
msg: Modified markup parser to ignore <?xml ... ?> tags in documents and not treat them as markup. Also introduced a test case to make sure this error cannot occur again.

author: sourceforge-skipoles
msg: Changes due to replacement of HtmlTagModifier with ComponentTagAttributeModifier

author: sourceforge-skipoles
msg: Added new ComponentTagAttributeModifier class and test cases. Also modifications to Component to support this plus deprecation of the obsolete HtmlTagModifier and its subclasses.
